title: Mordekaiser is the best right now
body: What the actual f*** was the riot balance team smoking when they reworked mordekaiser. So ridiculously stupidly overpowered bot lane. I want a word with their dealer cause that's gotta be some seriously dank shit. F da h8rz 'cause chances are I'm better than you anyway xx

replies.body: Rhyz es not brave like Brazil. Morde es uno numero huehuehuehuehue.
Play against a smart Ashe and r.i.p botlane.
